oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Chemoselectivity in the Cu-catalyzed O-arylation of phenols and aliphatic alcohols
oai_dc:dc.dc:creator: MAITI, D
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: COUPLING REACTIONS
N-ARYLATION
COPPER
CHEMISTRY
INVENTION
LIGANDS
HALIDES
ARYL
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: An orthogonal set of Cu-catalysts for the selective mono-arylation of alkyl aryl diols using aryl iodides is presented. Picolinic acid ligated copper catalyst provided phenol O-arylation only, while alkyl aryl ethers are generated by ligand-free copper catalyst in the presence of 2 equivalents NaOt-Bu.
